column4: does anyone here have experience setting up a mouse with many butons
actually I was following this: http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/ManyButtonsMouseHowto but its says something about modifying /etc/X11/Xsession.d/60imwheel_start-imwheel and I get lost
I'm not sure you need imwheel
my forward/back works in Mozilla already without it
I was hoping to get it working with IM wheel since I have other plans for the buttons
its just the part i mentioned that im confused about
I think you just need to create the config and then run imwheel to get the features
